column1: Text table 3. Sources of income in the month before arrest among State prison inmates, by mental health status
report title: Mental Health Problems of Prison and Jail Inmates  NCJ 213600
data source: Survey of Inmates in State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2004; Survey of Inmates in Local Jails, 2002
authors: Doris J. James and Lauren E. Glaze
Text table 3. Sources of income in the month before arrest among State prisoners, by mental health status
a/Includes personal income in month before arrest, except for compensation which was in the month before admission.
b/Includes Supplemental Security Income (SSI) payments and pension.
